message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SD

The paper deals with task clustering for deep learning-based multi-task and few-shot learning, which falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the paper focuses on sentiment classification and dialog intent classification tasks, which are natural language processing (NLP) tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also mentions using deep learning for computer vision tasks, which suggests cs.CV (Computer Vision) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a novel algorithm for matrix completion, which could fall under cs.SD (Systems and Control).
